original_text: And they found an Egyptian in the field, and brought him to David, and gave him bread, and he did eat; and they made him drink water;
korean_text: 무리가 들에서 애굽 사람 하나를 만나 그를 다윗에게로 데려다가 떡을 주어 먹게 하며 물을 마시게 하고

sentences.original_text: And they found an Egyptian in the field
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 들에서 한 이집트 사람을 발견했고

sentences.original_text: and they made him drink water
